detectors.description: Variable PumperToken._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#47) is not in mixedCase

PumperToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#57-65) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 500000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PumperToken.sol#61)
detectors.markdown:
